org.apache.flink.graph.drivers.parameter

类 IterationConvergence

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.graph.drivers.parameter.IterationConvergence
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    Parameter<IterationConvergence.Value>

    public class IterationConvergence
extends java.lang.Object
implements Parameter<IterationConvergence.Value>
    Iterative algorithms which converge can be terminated with a maximum number of iterations or a convergence threshold which stops computation when the total change in scores is below a given delta.

    If the command-line configuration specifies neither a number of iterations nor a convergence threshold then a default number of iterations is used with an infinite convergence threshold. Otherwise, when either value is configured then an unset value is set to infinity.

      Encapsulate the number of iterations and the convergence threshold.

        defaultIterations - the default number of iterations if neither the number of iterations nor the convergence threshold are specified

        public java.lang.String getUsage()
        从接口复制的说明: Parameter
        An informal usage string. Parameter names are prefixed with "--".

        Optional parameters are enclosed by "[" and "]".

        Generic values are represented by all-caps with specific values enclosed by "<" and ">".

        指定者:

      • isHidden

        public boolean isHidden()
        从接口复制的说明: Parameter
        A hidden parameter is parsed from the command-line configuration but is not printed in the usage string. This can be used for power-user options not displayed to the general user.
        指定者:
        isHidden 在接口中 Parameter<IterationConvergence.Value>
        返回:
        whether this parameter should be hidden from standard usage
